GSD.description:
ASoC: SOF: Intel: hda-dai: fix possible stream_tag leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.95 by commit 180a1632b6c723d8683be98edbdf2434787eb1a8. For more details please see the references link.
